0.1.4.name: wordpress/qrzcom-search-widget
0.1.4.description:
This widget places a search box to the QRZ.com website on your site. Use this search box to search the call sign of another Amateur Radio (Ham) operator on QRZ.com.

The following aspects are customizeable:
  • Widget title
  • Search button text

The following aspects are not yet customizeable:

  • The default value of the search is W0DTF
  • The width of the text input
Pressing the search button pops open a new window with the search results.
